page.title: 09KEEPING AN AVIARY
page.content:
their efforts to stop his evil plans. I enjoy reading a lot especially books by Roald Dahl and Enid Blyton. My favourite stories are about children who solve mysteries."
Keeping An Aviary "My Dad has built an aviary in our back garden. In my spare time I am awlays in our aviary. First I have to collect the water pots and take them down to the house to clean. After that I take the watering ca and the pots back up to the aviary. When I am in the aviary I have to get the rake and the watering can and sprinkle water over the floor so it is nice and clean. I put the pots back on the floor with the seed bowls. After cleaning them out I go and get the spray gun and I spray the eggs which are in special boxes. The eggs are
